title: Deep dia logos dive into Non-duality w/ Layman Pascal - Voices with Vervaeke
description: Layman and I  seriously play with the topic of non-duality in a dia logos that ranges from Neoplatonic investigation of intelligibility to practical transformation in individual lives and collective cognition.
